column5: Please take a moment..even if you're not having issues...need to know!

I am not having problems..till I tried to vote... it will not post unless you vote for both polls......so your second poll should have ()not having a problem unless that was what "other" was for.. but I figured it was for wifi hotspot or motel or whatever
Thanks Terry..wasn't aware of that. Need to see if I can alter that.
I view this board at home and work....but could only choose one....for the record on this poll I chose work...but it works at home too.
all is fine here for me Rick but Outlaw still can not access his account not sure why I  hope to get over to his house and try to get him hooked up
Good for me in all places work and home.
I have to log in everytime at work and at home.. Sometimes I log in and when the next page pops up I am still not logged in and have to re do it again.. Robin
No problems here, The only time i had to log in was when i logged out.
So far, staying logged in at home, no hiccups, but I can log in both home and work.
All good, I wonder if some people are having problems b/c of the way their browser is set up for cookies?  Mike
No problems here, but I have a hard time believing the 2nd poll, 2nd choice, lol.
